title: NYC Subway Attacks Show Challenge Adams Faces on Crime - The New York Times
content:
1. NYC Subway Attacks Show Challenge Adams Faces on Crime  The New York Times
  2. NYC subway safety plan begins after violent weekend underground  PIX11 News
  3. NYC police report 6 subway stabbings, 2 attacks with hatchet, pipe as zero tolerance plan takes effect  Fox News
  4. Eric Adams' NYC subway safety crackdown in effect starting today  New York Post
  5. Riding the rails: Adams and Hochul lay out a credible plan to help homeless people on the subways and platforms  New York Daily News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The mayor and governor released a safety plan for the subways that focused on homelessness. But a homeless person was believed to be responsible in only one of the weekend attacks.
